titles.title: Higher Education Savings Plan Act of 1993
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to promote savings for qualified higher education expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/24/1993--Introduced. Higher Education Savings Plan Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt distributions from a higher education expenses annuity contract from the ten-percent penalty on premature distributions from annuity contracts. Excludes the premium to purchase such a contract from gift tax liability.
